00041 namespace dai {
00042 
00043 
00045 class MR : public DAIAlgFG {
00046     private:
00047         bool supported;                                            // is the underlying factor graph supported?
00048 
00049         std::vector<size_t>                             con;       // con[i] = connectivity of spin i
00050         std::vector<std::vector<size_t> >               nb;        // nb[i] are the neighbours of spin i
00051         std::vector<std::vector<double> >               tJ;        // tJ[i][_j] is the tanh of the interaction between spin i and its neighbour nb[i][_j]
00052         std::vector<double>                             theta;     // theta[i] is the local field on spin i
00053         std::vector<std::vector<double> >               M;         // M[i][_j] is M^{(i)}_j
00054         std::vector<std::vector<size_t> >               kindex;    // the _j'th neighbour of spin i has spin i as its kindex[i][_j]'th neighbour
00055         std::vector<std::vector<std::vector<double> > > cors;
00056     
00057         static const size_t kmax = 31;
00058         typedef boost::dynamic_bitset<> sub_nb;
00059         
00060         size_t N;
00061 
00062         std::vector<double> Mag;
00063 
00064         double _maxdiff;
00065         size_t _iters;
00066 
00067     public:
00069         struct Properties {
00071             DAI_ENUM(UpdateType,FULL,LINEAR)
00072 
00073             
00074             DAI_ENUM(InitType,RESPPROP,CLAMPING,EXACT)
00075 
00076             
00077             size_t verbose;
00078 
00080             double tol;
00081 
00083             UpdateType updates;
00084 
00086             InitType inits;
00087         } props;
00088 
00090         static const char *Name;
00091 
00092     public:
00094         MR() : DAIAlgFG(), supported(), con(), nb(), tJ(), theta(), M(), kindex(), cors(), N(), Mag(), _maxdiff(), _iters(), props() {}
00095 
00097         MR( const MR &x ) : DAIAlgFG(x), supported(x.supported), con(x.con), nb(x.nb), tJ(x.tJ), theta(x.theta), M(x.M), kindex(x.kindex), cors(x.cors), N(x.N), Mag(x.Mag), _maxdiff(x._maxdiff), _iters(x._iters), props(x.props) {}
00098 
00100         MR& operator=( const MR &x ) {
00101             if( this != &x ) {
00102                 DAIAlgFG::operator=(x);
00103                 supported = x.supported;
00104                 con       = x.con; 
00105                 nb        = x.nb;
00106                 tJ        = x.tJ;
00107                 theta     = x.theta;
00108                 M         = x.M;
00109                 kindex    = x.kindex;
00110                 cors      = x.cors;
00111                 N         = x.N;
00112                 Mag       = x.Mag;
00113                 _maxdiff  = x._maxdiff;
00114                 _iters    = x._iters;
00115                 props     = x.props;
00116             }
00117             return *this;
00118         }
00119 
00121         MR( const FactorGraph &fg, const PropertySet &opts );
00122 
00123 
00125 
00126         virtual MR* clone() const { return new MR(*this); }
00127         virtual MR* create() const { return new MR(); }
00128         virtual std::string identify() const;
00129         virtual Factor belief( const Var &n ) const;
00130         virtual Factor belief( const VarSet &/*ns*/ ) const { DAI_THROW(NOT_IMPLEMENTED); return Factor(); }
00131         virtual std::vector<Factor> beliefs() const;
00132         virtual Real logZ() const { DAI_THROW(NOT_IMPLEMENTED); return 0.0; }
00133         virtual void init() {}
00134         virtual void init( const VarSet &/*ns*/ ) { DAI_THROW(NOT_IMPLEMENTED); }
00135         virtual double run();
00136         virtual double maxDiff() const { return _maxdiff; }
00137         virtual size_t Iterations() const { return _iters; }
00139

00144         
00145     private:
00146         void init(size_t Nin, double *_w, double *_th);
00147         void makekindex();
00148         void init_cor();
00149         double init_cor_resp();
00150         void solvemcav();
00151         void solveM();
00152 
00153         double _tJ(size_t i, sub_nb A);
00154 
00155         double Omega(size_t i, size_t _j, size_t _l);
00156         double T(size_t i, sub_nb A);
00157         double T(size_t i, size_t _j);
00158         double Gamma(size_t i, size_t _j, size_t _l1, size_t _l2);
00159         double Gamma(size_t i, size_t _l1, size_t _l2);
00160 
00161         double appM(size_t i, sub_nb A);
00162         void sum_subs(size_t j, sub_nb A, double *sum_even, double *sum_odd);
00163 
00164         double sign(double a) { return (a >= 0) ? 1.0 : -1.0; }
00165         
00166         void setProperties( const PropertySet &opts );
00167         PropertySet getProperties() const;
00168         std::string printProperties() const;
00169 };
